title: Mentors Who Influence Eternity
itunes:summary:
What do you do when your child isn't open to hearing the gospel? It might be that God will use a mentor to help bring your son or daughter back to the faith. John asks Danny about someone who had a huge influence on his own faith growing up. Featuring David Kinnaman and Mark Matlock.


Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.


Receive the book "Faith for Exiles" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2022-05-12?refcd=1460802


Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/mentors-who-influence-eternity/#featured-resource-cta


Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/helping-your-teens-retain-their-faith-digital-download/?refcd=1460802


If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
